p: LAIVs have been used in Russia since the 1960s and were licensed for use in North America and Europe in 2003 [ 4]. Recently, Russian LAIVs were licensed in China ( http://www.biodiem.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/20-02-28-LAIV-influenza-vaccine-approved-in-China.pdf). The efficacy of intranasal LAIVs is up to 80% in children under six years of age, and 40% in adults [ 5, 6].
